resources.string: If you feel that my work can help you, please consider donating for helping me to keep working on open source projects like this!
Thank you! You have chosen to donate %1$s
Please access one of the links bellow to buy me a drink:

My name is Fabio and I\'m a software engineer from Brazil. I\'ve been working with software development for about twenty years. My main field of actuation is with backend development in Java and Kotlin but I do program in many other languages and I also do some front end and mobile development. \n I really enjoy working with open source software and, therefore, I use to contribute to some projects.
